content:
Action:4

I'm moving UP from the current position (7,1) to begin a planned ascent toward the corridor that leads via (6,11) and (4,11) so I can clear the box above and access the exit at row1, col11.

Action:2

I'm moving the avatar from (6,1) to (6,2) to start exploring a route toward the exit at (1,11), ensuring we begin navigating around the obstacles in a careful manner.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,2) to (6,3) to start positioning toward a route that can eventually lead upward and toward the exit while preparing to strategically push boxes if needed.

```Action:2```

I'm attempting to push the box right so that I can progress horizontally toward the exit at (1,11) while clearing a potential path.

Action:2

I'm pushing right so the box at (6,5) bounces into (6,6) and my avatar moves to (6,5), advancing closer to the exit while following the strategy.

Action:2

I'm choosing to push the box on the right (from (6,5) to (6,6)) because the space beyond it is clear, which helps clear a potential path toward the exit at (1,11); I expect that after this action, my avatar will shift into (6,6), setting up further moves upward/right toward the goal.

Action:4

I'm moving up in hopes of reaching an open floor and gradually progressing toward the exit.

Action:3

I'm moving down from row5, col6 to row6, col6, aiming to find a clearer path to the exit while avoiding immediate blockages by boxes.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar up from (6,6) to (5,6) to progress toward the exit at (1,11), expecting that this move will safely bring me closer to my goal.

Action:2

I'm choosing to move right so the avatar can push the box at (5,7) into the free cell at (5,8), which will progress us toward the exit at (1,11) following our overall strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar upward from (5,7) to (4,7) since that cell is empty and it aligns with the strategy of gradually advancing towards the exit while avoiding hazards.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (4,7) to (4,8) because it safely brings me closer to the exit at (1,11) while avoiding immediate hazards, and I expect the avatar to actually advance this turn.

Action:1

I’m choosing to move left—expecting the avatar to move from (4,8) to (4,7) onto safe floor—so I can later navigate around obstacles toward the exit.

Action:2

I’m moving to the right from (4,7) to (4,8) on solid floor, aiming to maneuver closer to a path that eventually leads upward toward the exit.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (4,8) to push the box blocking the upward cell, expecting the avatar to advance into (3,8) and get closer to a clear path toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:3

I'm moving down from (3,8) to (4,8), as that floor space is free and opens a new path towards the exit while avoiding the boxes blocking other directions.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (4,8) to (3,8), which should bring me closer to the exit while avoiding immediate hazards per the strategy.

``` Action:4 ```
I'm pushing upward so that the box at (2,8) is pushed into (1,8), allowing my rat to advance toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,8) to (3,8) to get onto a free floor and begin maneuvering around the blocking boxes toward the exit.

Action:4

I'm moving upward from the avatar's current position (row 3, col 8) into an open floor at (row 2, col 8) to progress toward the exit at (row 1, col 11), ensuring that I'm following the planned route.

Action:2

I'm pushing right to move the avatar toward the exit; I expect the box at (2,9) to be pushed into the free space at (2,10), letting the avatar advance closer to the goal at (1,11).

Action:4

I'm moving UP to go from (2,9) to (1,9), as it's a clear path that brings the avatar closer to the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I’m moving the avatar to the right to progress towards the exit at (1,11), expecting to see it advance into the clear floor cell at (1,10) on this action.

Action:2

Moving right should take the avatar directly onto the exit, fulfilling the win condition.
